info.author: Lauri Võsandi
info.keywords: falcon http jinja2 x509 pkcs11 webcrypto
info.name: certidude
info.summary: Certidude is a novel X.509 Certificate Authority management tool aiming to support PKCS#11 and in far future WebCrypto.
